definition: to depend on/to hang on in a place/bad/to renege (on promise)/to disclaim/to rat (on debts)/rascally/to blame/to put the blame on
sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: Look at the absolute figures for lysine and arginine content.
sentences.chinese: 看的賴氨酸和精氨酸含量的絕對數字。

sentences.english: The breeding methods of high-quality protein maize were studied in 1979-1984.
sentences.chinese: 1984年，對高賴氨酸玉米育種方法進行了研究。

sentences.english: Increase your intake of L-Lysine and decrease the amount of arginine in your diet.
sentences.chinese: 在你的食譜中增加賴氨酸和減少精氨酸的攝入數量。

sentences.english: Other features which make it unique are its content of hydroxylysine.
sentences.chinese: 其他使之獨特的特點是它的羥基賴氨酸含量。

sentences.english: The lysine can be desorbed rapidly with ammonia.
sentences.chinese: 用氨水可將吸附的賴氨酸迅速解吸。

sentences.english: A process for the synthesis of N6-trifluoroacetyl-L-lysine has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 對三氟乙酰賴氨酸的合成工藝進行了研究。

sentences.english: For example rice is low in isoleucine and lysine.
sentences.chinese: 例如，米飯中的異亮氨酸和賴氨酸就非常少。

sentences.english: Thailand currently makes use of GM Escherichia coli as an inoculant in lysine production.
sentences.chinese: 泰國目前利用轉基因大腸桿菌作爲菌種來生產賴氨酸。

sentences.english: Therefore, this method for determining lysine content in soybean by using 721 Type p…
sentences.chinese: 說明改用721分光儀測定大豆賴氨酸含量是可行的。

sentences.english: Lys has no any promoting effect on cephalosporin C fermentation.
sentences.chinese: 賴氨酸對頭孢菌素C發酵可能無任何積極作用。

pinyin: bu4 bao3 he2 zhi1 fang2 suan1

definition: choline (amine related to vitamin B complex)
